import { t } from '../translation';
export default function validateInteger(v) {
  if (typeof v === 'string' &&
  v.trim().length > 0 &&
  Number.isInteger(Number(v.trim())) ||
  typeof v === 'number' && Number.isInteger(v)) {
    return false;
  }
  return t('is expected to be an integer');
}
